abstract: A discussion about emerging markets in Davos on Thursday soon focused on the question whether the rapid growth rates in China and other nations are sustainable or just another bubble.
snippet: A discussion about emerging markets in Davos on Thursday soon focused on the question whether the rapid growth rates in China and other nations are sustainable or just another bubble.
lead_paragraph: A discussion about emerging markets here on Thursday soon focused on the question of whether the rapid growth rates in China and other nations are sustainable or just another bubble.

headline.main: Will Someone Please Decide If That’s a Bubble?
